resources.string: 1. You are supposed to make as many words as you can from the given set of letters in the grid. There is a maximum number of words possible. Your goal is to make as many as possible. 2. You get a fixed number of points in each game. Those points get deducted based on the difference of the number of possible words and your score. The game ends as soon as these points get over. Lastly you can challenge the game to show you all the possible words.
